question: Shaheed Udham Singh, whose 120<sup>th</sup> birth anniversary was observed recently, is most associated with which incident?
explanation: Shaheed Udham Singh is a revolutionary born on December 26<sup>th</sup>, 1899 in Punjab. He is most associated with the Jallianwala Bagh tragedy at Amritsar. He is noted for his assassination of Michael Oâ€™Dwyer- who was the governor of Punjab at that time.
